column4: hi folks.... I've just changed video card and am looking at a text screen now (x won't start).  I've tried xconfig, XF86Setup, etc. searched the ubuntu page, read the x man page, but nothing works (can't get the configurator thing started), any ideas ?
I tried that I think, will try again, brb :)
Chastaghir: thanks, got x reconfigured, the new card works now :)
